passages.text:
Dear spectator, it's a pleasure to have you here! Welcome!
Here, you will witness snippets from our hero's life and help them make critical decisions.
@eon_idle_human
[[Eon]]
passages.name: Hello

passages.text:
This is Eon. She is no hero in real terms. Just an ordinary girl. She can be shy or bold depends on her mood. Sometimes she is extremely wise, but sometimes she is just impulsive. Friendly when she feels comfortable, anxious when she feels threatened. @eon_hi_norm
As I said, just a regular person like any of us. But that is about to change. 
[[Thunder]]
passages.name: Eon

passages.text:
Maybe it was Lady Fortuna getting bored, or Zeus playing games with his subjects...Well, who knows the real cause? @eon_thunder_norm
That day, Eon was hit by a thunder and her personality was splitted into four different personas, each representing a certain part from her soul.
[[Lion|Lion]]
passages.name: Thunder

passages.text:
The first persona is the Lion. @eon_roar_lion
Lion is an extremely bold character. She always speaks her mind, never afraid of anything. That can be a good or bad trait of course. Because sometimes, she just doesn't know where to stop.
She also has a short temper, and a strong fighter. A real survivor. At least in soul.
[[Ox|Ox]]
passages.name: Lion

passages.text:
The second persona is the Ox. @eon_hi_ox
The Ox is an extremely friendly and kind character. She tends to see the best in people but some might call her naive. 
Unlike Lion, she gets stressed pretty often. Pressure really cracks her. She feels vulnerable pretty frequently.
[[Human|Human]]
passages.name: Ox

passages.text:
Eon's third persona is the Human.@eon_sinister_human
The Human has an extremly sharp mind. She can almost see through people, some might even call her a trickster. But that feature also turns her a sinister character sometimes.
She is also known for her creativity. Problems of all sort is soluable according to the Human.
[[Eagle|Eagle]]
passages.name: Human

passages.text:
And finally, the Eagle. @eon_think_eagle
Eagle tends to be really wise. She can usually stay calm under stressful situations which helps her find a meaningful solution.
However, she tends to stay on the colder side socially. She is not as capable of emotional connection as the other personas do.
[[Eagle|Persona Switch]]
passages.name: Eagle

passages.text:
Down below, you'll see the Ox persona icon. 
You can click on different personas and switch to a different character.
Let's click on the Ox icon to select a different persona.
Then click on the arrow to on the right side to go to the next block.
[[Ox|Selection]]
passages.name: Persona Switch

passages.text:
@eon_hello_ox
You'll see below that there are more than one icon. There is the Eagle & Ox below. 
Make a selection if you'd like to switch back to Eagle. 
Finish and move to the next story block by clicking on the arrow.
[[Eagle|Option 1]]
[[Ox|Option 2]]
passages.name: Selection

passages.text:
@eon_think_eagle
As you move through story blocks, you'll see the big wheel on the left side turning.
There are slots on the wheel representing the story blocks you've been through.
They can get useful if you'd like to travel back and change your decisions.
[[Ox|Test]]
passages.name: Option 1

passages.text:
@eon_hello_ox
As you move through story blocks, you'll see the big wheel on the left side turning.
There are slots on the wheel representing the story blocks you've been through.
They can get useful if you'd like to travel back and change your decisions.
[[Ox|Test]]
passages.name: Option 2

passages.text:
Let's give it a try! Here is an apple for Eon to eat. 
Select a persona before moving on to the next story block. That will change how the story evolves.
[[Ox|Yum]]
[[Eagle|Suspicious]]
passages.name: Test

passages.text:
Eon:<color="blue">"An apple? Looks yum! Thank you!"</color> @eon_eating_ox
[[Ox|Sick]]
passages.name: Yum

passages.text:
Eon:<color="blue">"An apple? Thank you but I don't eat food coming from strangers."</color>
[[Eagle|Smart]]
passages.name: Suspicious

passages.text:
Eon:<color="blue">"Oh, I feel sick. What's happening?"</color>@eon_vomit_ox
Sorry Eon, I'm trying to make a point, so I drugged the apple.
Eon:<color="blue">"But, why would you do that?"</color>
If you like, dear player, you can go back and see what happens if you stick with the Eagle. @eon_tired_ox
[[Ox|Special Powers]]
passages.name: Sick

passages.text:
Well, that was a smart move Eon! Because that Apple was kinda poisonous.
Eon:<color="blue">"What's wrong with you?"</color> @eon_confused_eagle
Just doing a little demonstration.
If you like, dear player, you can go back and see what happens if you stick with the Ox. 
[[Eagle|Special Powers]]
passages.name: Smart

passages.text:
Keep in mind that you have a limit to go back in time. Use it wisely.
Each persona has a special power that you can only use once throughout the whole story.
[[Eagle|Eagle Power]]
passages.name: Special Powers

passages.text:
When you make certain choices you'll find special prizes hidden for Eon. 
The Eagle can see the specific story block where the prize is hidden and show it to you.
You still need to figure out how to get there though.
@eon_idle_eagle
[[Human|Human Power]]
passages.name: Eagle Power

passages.text:
Human has an ability to see the future. 
She can see what is in the next upcoming three nodes without actually moving through the story.
Based on that, you can decide to stick with the Human or swap to another character.
@eon_idle_human
[[Lion|Lion Power]]
passages.name: Human Power
Lion Power

passages.text:
Some choices will take Eon to undesirable ends in the story. 
Ox can foresee these points in the story.
Bitter ends are part of life. However, if you'd like to avoid them, you can make use of Ox's special power.
@eon_idle_ox
[[Eon|Game]]
passages.name: Ox Power

passages.text:
Now, you are ready to go on a journey with Eon.
There are four stories available for you to experience together with Eon.
If you ever get confused, there is a cheatsheet available on the bottom menu.
Good luck and enjoy discovering Eon's world!
@eon_hi_ox
passages.name: Game
